text: The Deal barracks bombing was an attack on the Royal Marine Depot in Deal, Kent, England on 22 September 1989.Deal IRA bomb The Provisional Irish Republican Army used a time bomb to kill 11 military bandsmen. == References == Category:1989 in Europe Category:1980s building bombings Category:1980s explosions in Europe Category:1980s murders in the United Kingdom Category:Attacks on military installations Category:British Army Category:Building bombings in England Category:History of Kent Category:Mass murder in England Category:Mass murder in the 1980s Category:Provisional Irish Republican Army Category:Terrorist incidents in the United Kingdom in the 1980s
title: Deal barracks bombing
